welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Palisades Park, where charm and beauty meet! Get ready to explore our vibrant city known for its breathtaking views and diverse culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all that Palisades Park has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights for American Airlines, JetBlue, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Airlines and WestJet.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Airlines and Frontier Airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights at Linden Airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and chartered flights at Linden Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
